# Universal Cloud Project Setup - Completed ✅

## Project Overview
Universal Cloud is a modern, premium hosting and tech solutions platform built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. The project includes:

- Premium hosting solutions (VPS, domains, Minecraft servers)
- Custom development services (web apps, bots, mobile apps)
- Client/Admin/Developer dashboards
- Advanced security and authentication
- SEO-optimized pages
- Responsive design system
